sentence.text: He was completely oblivious to the noise of the shells passing overhead , or the rattle of automatic fire echoing through the orchard .
The noise of the sheep pounding across the field was loud , like horses in a film .
Endill heard the noise of glass smashing , plaster crumbling and furniture being broken .
There was a lot of noise of men shouting and dogs barking , as the servants from the house pursued the robbers across the fields .
Lily heard with dull resentment the noises of the outside world going about joyful business .
Then the noise of a car grinding up the other side of the hill broke in upon the blessed peace of their embrace , and separated them .
` We heard the noise of glass falling to the floor and I saw this group of three heading straight for the door .
It was a warm day , the noise of traffic came through the slightly open window .
The noise of the storm was muffled now .
` Get down there , quickly ! " he shouted above the noise of the helicopter 's engine .
The terrible noise of the alarm was still going .
Nessie had the pig bucket in her hand when she heard the noise of singing in the early evening air .
Their noise would have undoubtedly caused enormous damage to the sensitive hearing of marine mammals .
One of the sheep pushed its way out of the flock in response to the lamb 's feeble noise .
You may well be ashamed to see me after your noise and nonsense .
Suddenly its noise was distinct and loud like a tractor coming over the western horizon .
He loped up the street in zigzags , swooping and making aeroplane noises .
Birchall recalls Le Mans practice last July when he noticed a tiny change in gearbox noise , even above the scream of the Krauser engine .
He made a non-committal noise , and Mick grinned .
It was incredibly quiet , with distant traffic noise making it seem even quieter .
` Where are we goin' first ? " he yelled over the wind noise .
He made swishing noises indicating the beating of wings .
It 'd be just like the country if there was n't all the noise from the traffic .
There was a strange singing noise in his ears .
Professor Slocombe shook his head and made clicking noises with his tongue .
They say noise from it has dramatically changed their lives .
If disturbed during hibernation , the peacock butterfly can make a hissing noise by rubbing its wings together .
Male crickets make a noise by rubbing their wings together .
Outside Mildred 's room , Ethel pressed her ear against the door and was surprised to hear a strange noise from within .
As the adventurers lie in a heap , there is a horrid , liquid churning noise from behind the door at the top of the stairs .
The noise of heavily amplified Hindi movie music can be heard until well after two or three in the morning .
The moth 's physical appearance is not quite as wasp-like but it adds to its disguise by making a buzzing noise .
There was something by the shady side of the wardrobe that made a noise .
Then he had difficulty with his hearing and heard some noises .
